remarks: Apply a homomorphism to a sequence.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqhomo.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqhomo.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. S ) $.
seqhomo.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqhomo.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( H ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( H ` x ) Q ( H ` y ) ) ) $.
seqhomo.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( H ` ( F ` x ) ) = ( G ` x ) ) $.
seqhomo $p |- ( ph -> ( H ` ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) ) = ( seq M ( Q , G ) ` N ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x $.
$d H x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d Q x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
